name: Iron Short Sword
description: A practical, no-frills short sword with a leather-wrapped hilt.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A well-balanced longsword forged from high-quality steel.

name: Blacksmith's Tongs
description: Heavy iron tongs used for gripping hot metal at the forge.

name: Magically Tempered Hammer
description: A smithing hammer enchanted to never chip or crack, ideal for delicate work.

name: Spiked Mace
description: A brutal weapon with a head of spiked iron, designed to break bone and armor.

name: Chainmail Shirt
description: Protective mail made from hundreds of interlinked steel rings.

name: Boot Knife
description: A small hidden blade designed to fit inside a boot or sleeve.

name: Runed Forgeblade
description: A longsword engraved with glowing runes that deal extra damage to constructs.

name: Flameforged Gauntlets
description: Steel gauntlets enchanted to protect the wearer’s hands from extreme heat.

name: Mythic Blade of the Dawn
description: A legendary longsword that emits radiant light and heals its wielder slightly upon striking undead.

name: Custom Forging Order
description: A commission slot for a specialized weapon or piece of armor, tailored to the customer.

name: Nails and Iron Spikes (10ct)
description: Essential supplies for construction or fortification, forged from scrap iron.

name: Reinforced Tower Shield
description: A massive, iron-banded shield that can cover a full-grown adult.

name: Collapsible Spear
description: A spear with a folding shaft, ideal for travelers and scouts.

name: Whetstone of the North
description: A cold-forged sharpening stone that improves the durability of blades when used regularly.

name: Tempered War Axe
description: A single-bladed war axe with a thick oak handle and well-balanced weight.

name: Double-Headed Great Axe
description: A massive axe forged for two-handed combat, ideal for heavy infantry or barbarians.

name: Serpent Fang Dagger
description: A curved dagger with a wicked edge, engraved with a snake motif.

name: Meteor Hammer
description: A pair of iron spheres connected by chain, used in exotic martial styles.

name: Blade of Frozen Resolve
description: This longsword emanates cold vapor and deals extra cold damage on a strike.

name: Dwarven Forgeplate
description: Heavy plate armor reinforced with rune-etched steel, forged by dwarven smiths.

name: Iron Scale Mail
description: A set of armor made from overlapping iron scales, offering decent mobility and protection.

name: Runic Gauntlets of Strength
description: Heavy gauntlets that enhance the wearer’s grip and punching force.

name: Radiant Breastplate
description: A polished breastplate that gleams with holy energy, shedding light in darkness.

name: Wraith-forged Helmet
description: A darkened steel helmet that mutes the wearer's voice and grants night vision.

name: Reinforced Chain Shirt
description: A durable chain shirt reinforced with small steel plates at key impact zones.

name: Spiked Tower Shield
description: A massive iron shield with protruding spikes, favored by defensive formations.

name: Studded Leather Helm
description: A padded leather helmet with brass studs and reinforced stitching.

name: Runed Gauntlets
description: Steel gauntlets with etched runes that channel kinetic force into punches.

name: Shield-Breaker Pauldrons
description: Heavy shoulder guards designed to push through enemy shields during a charge.

name: Ceremonial Guard Breastplate
description: Polished armor worn by elite city guards for parades and official functions.

name: Gilded Heater Shield
description: A triangular shield bearing gold filigree and the crest of a local noble house.

name: Plated Elbow Vambraces
description: Metal forearm guards lined with felt padding and reinforced hinges.

name: Knight's Great Helm
description: A full metal helm with narrow eye slits and a crest slot for feathers or banners.

name: Gripping Gauntlets
description: Specially jointed gloves designed to improve grip on polearms and long weapons.

name: Iron Shinguards
description: Plain but effective leg protection worn by guards and traveling mercenaries.

name: Armor of Barkskin
description: This living cuirass is woven from enchanted wood and moss. It adapts to the wearer’s body and seems to stiffen when danger is near.

name: Mirror Shield
description: A highly polished shield said to deflect more than just blades. Legends speak of mages cursing themselves when they aim at its bearer.

name: Helm of the Deep Watch
description: Crafted with blacksteel and etched with runes that glow in utter darkness. Wearers claim to sense danger long before it arrives.

name: Stormcaller's Gauntlets
description: Crackling with residual energy, these gauntlets occasionally arc between fingertips and can deliver painful shocks in combat.

name: Phantom Pauldrons
description: These shoulder guards feel cold to the touch and flicker faintly when worn near old battlefields. They seem to resist ghostly harm.

name: Wyrmhide Vestments
description: Stitched from the hide of an ancient wyrm, this armor radiates old, draconic power. It hums softly when exposed to magic.

name: Set of Plate Armor, Knight’s Valor
description: A masterfully crafted full set of gleaming plate armor favored by elite knights, offering exceptional protection and style.

name: Set of Studded Leather Armor, Shadowstalker
description: A full suit of studded leather armor designed for stealth and agility, worn by expert scouts and assassins.

name: Set of Chainmail Armor, Ironwood Guard
description: Durable full chainmail offering a balance between protection and mobility, favored by city guards and militia.

name: Set of Scale Mail Armor, Dragonhide Pattern
description: A full suit of scale mail with dragon scale motifs, providing enhanced defense and an intimidating look.

name: Set of Brigandine Armor, Desert Wind
description: Lightweight brigandine armor crafted for desert environments, combining protection with breathability.

name: Set of Full Plate Armor, Frostguard
description: A heavy plate armor set designed to keep the wearer protected and insulated in polar regions.

name: Set of Leather Armor, Ranger’s Blend
description: A full leather armor set that aids camouflage in forests and jungles, favored by rangers and hunters.

name: Set of Half-Plate Armor, Sentinel’s Guard
description: A versatile half-plate armor offering solid protection while allowing decent mobility, used by city watch.

name: Set of Plate Armor, Grand Marshal
description: A stunning full plate armor set, meticulously crafted to provide supreme defense and regal presence.

name: Set of Chainmail Armor, Vanguard
description: A reliable full chainmail set offering balanced protection, preferred by frontline warriors.

name: Set of Studded Leather Armor, Nightshade
description: A sleek studded leather armor set designed for stealth and agility in any environment.

name: Set of Scale Mail Armor, Ironclad
description: A durable scale mail set providing excellent protection without sacrificing too much mobility.

name: Set of Half-Plate Armor, Sentinel
description: A practical half-plate armor set offering solid defense and flexibility in various conditions.

name: Set of Leather Armor, Tracker
description: A full leather armor set tailored for mobility and camouflage, ideal for scouts and rangers.

name: Shield of the Shifting Citadel
description: A heavy, rune-bound shield once part of a mobile fortress. It can change shape to provide cover for multiple allies in a pinch.

name: Helm of Tongues
description: Adorned with symbols from lost civilizations, this helm allows the wearer to understand the intent of nearly any spoken word.

name: Gauntlets of Giantkind
description: Forged with remnants of giant bone and hide, these gauntlets feel unnaturally heavy until worn. They lend the strength of mountain-born kin.

name: Mantle of Blazing Steel
description: A crimson-and-gold cloak that bursts into flame when the wearer is struck. The fire is harmless to allies — but not to foes.

name: Simple Oak Stool
description: A solid, square-legged stool made from rough-cut oak, favored by commonfolk.

name: Hand-Carved Wardrobe
description: Tall and narrow, this wardrobe is adorned with regional floral motifs and carved drawer pulls.

name: Traveler's Folding Cot
description: A compact wooden cot that folds for easy travel, with a canvas sling for sleeping.

name: Woodworking Chisel Set
description: A set of six iron chisels with oak handles, ideal for both rough and detail work.

name: Wall-Mounted Lantern Rack
description: A four-hook rack carved with wave patterns and coated in oil for moisture resistance.

name: Carved Window Shutters
description: Matched wooden shutters engraved with protective ward symbols — or so the craftsman claims.

name: Ornate Fireplace Mantel
description: A darkwood mantel carved with lion heads and arcane knotwork, built for noble homes.

name: Wooden Tally Beads
description: A set of smooth wooden beads on a cord, used for counting or prayer. Engraved with regional symbols.

name: Custom Trapdoor (Installation Extra)
description: A cleverly hinged floor panel with concealed seams — popular among paranoid nobles and tavern owners.

name: Wagon Bed Repair Kit
description: Includes two boards, nails, brackets, and a folding hammer — perfect for fixing a cracked wagon.

name: Simple Grave Marker
description: A small cross of cedar, suitable for marking a grave or memorial site. Some include space for a nameplate.

name: Custom Signboard
description: Blank wooden signboard in various shapes, ready to be painted with a business’s symbol or name.

name: Engraved Keepsake Box
description: A lockable cedarwood box engraved with vines or family crests, ideal for letters, jewelry, or secrets.

name: Runed Corner Braces
description: Etched with crude runes for 'endurance' and 'protection', these ironwood braces are as symbolic as they are sturdy.

name: Mystic Mantelpiece (Floating)
description: This exotic fixture hangs without supports, gently hovering an inch from the wall. Inlaid with glyphs of lightness.

name: Cedar Writing Desk
description: A polished desk with a hinged lid and hidden compartments for correspondence and keepsakes.

name: Wall-Mounted Bookshelf
description: Compact shelf carved from driftwood, perfect for tight quarters or study alcoves.

name: Puzzle Box
description: A small wooden box that must be manipulated in a specific sequence to open.

name: Field Carpenter's Kit
description: A satchel containing folding tools and repair supplies for field maintenance.

name: Decorative Wall Panel
description: Panel of carved walnut inlaid with brass leaf motifs, suitable for noble homes or temples.

name: Wooden Ceiling Fan (Manual)
description: A ceiling-mounted fan with pull-rope activation. Popular in warmer climates.

name: Gilded Throne Chair
description: An elaborate high-backed chair with gilded accents and velvet upholstery.

name: Folding Workbench
description: A durable, portable bench with collapsible legs and integrated tool slots.

name: Floating Shelves (Enchanted)
description: These shelves hang invisibly on the wall and resist tipping or slanting, regardless of load.

name: Livingwood Lattice Screen
description: A room divider woven from enchanted saplings that twist gently over time.

name: Impervious Timber Plank (Set of 4)
description: Hardwood planks sealed with a magical treatment that resists rot, pests, and water.

name: Ornamental Balustrade
description: Curved and polished railing designed for upper-floor balconies and landings.

name: Miniature Wooden Stage
description: Portable stage built from sturdy panels, ideal for entertainers and traveling bards.

name: Fireplace Bellows Rack
description: Wall-mounted rack for holding bellows and fire pokers; etched with flame-shaped carvings.

name: Runed Carpenter’s Mallet
description: A master-crafted mallet that subtly guides the user’s hand for cleaner joints and precision.

name: Blown Glass Decanter
description: A delicately shaped decanter with a swirling pattern of colored glass, perfect for fine wines or alchemical ingredients.

name: Vial Set (6)
description: A matching set of small clear vials, each sealed with a snug cork. Ideal for potions, oils, or rare herbs.

name: Etched Stained Glass Panel
description: A vivid mosaic of colored glass fitted into a wooden frame, often depicting religious or arcane imagery.

name: Oil Lamp Globe
description: A globe-shaped cover for an oil lamp, diffusing light in soft warm hues.

name: Spiral Potion Flask
description: A flask with a coiled glass body, making its contents swirl mesmerizingly.

name: Glass Eye Marbles
description: Small glass marbles, often used by children or fortune tellers. Each is hand-colored to resemble an eye.

name: Custom Perfume Bottle
description: A finely blown bottle with a swan-neck neck and a delicate glass stopper.

name: Glass Orb (Clear)
description: A crystal-clear glass orb about the size of a fist. Favored by mages and diviners.

name: Pane Set (4, Small)
description: Four rectangular panes of transparent glass, ideal for windows or small greenhouses.

name: Glowglass Lantern Globe
description: A faintly luminescent globe, softly glowing without flame. The light lasts for days.

name: Mirage Flask
description: A flask that subtly distorts the appearance of its contents, creating illusions of color or shimmer.

name: Silent Bell Dome
description: A glass dome that, when placed over an object, muffles all sound within.

name: Windowpane of Scrying
description: Appears as a normal windowpane but occasionally shows glimpses of far-off places.

name: Stained Glass Familiar
description: A small glass bird that animates and flutters when exposed to sunlight.

name: Ornate Glass Goblet
description: A wide-mouthed goblet with delicate silver inlay around the rim.

name: Sealed Alchemical Bottles (Set of 3)
description: Reinforced glass bottles resistant to temperature changes, ideal for volatile mixtures.

name: Suncatcher Disc
description: A thin panel of stained glass that refracts light into dancing colors across walls and ceilings.

name: Miniature Glass Animal (Dog)
description: A tiny, delicate sculpture of a hound mid-run, crafted from golden-tinted glass.

name: Blown Glass Pitcher
description: Sturdy and elegantly curved, this pitcher keeps liquids cooler for longer.

name: Elemental Flask (Steam)
description: Contains water that evaporates when opened, refilling again after sunrise.

name: Hollow Glass Wand
description: A wand-shaped rod filled with swirling iridescent sand. Used in rituals of focus and clarity.

name: Mirror Shard Amulet
description: A triangular shard of mirrored glass worn as a pendant. It occasionally hums softly.

name: Glass Music Bell
description: A hand-sized bell that produces a soft harmonic chime when moved.

name: Phantom Window
description: A pane of glass that appears transparent from one side and mirror-like from the other.

name: Flameproof Flask
description: This thick-walled flask is resistant to magical or mundane fire, used by smiths and alchemists alike.

name: Shimmering Glass Orb
description: This orb reflects light strangely, making it hard to tell its true shape or size.

name: Eversmoke Decanter
description: A decanter that releases a puff of harmless smoke every time it’s unsealed.

name: Hunter's Shortbow
description: A lightweight bow crafted from yew, favored by scouts and hunters for its balance.

name: Barbed Arrows (Bundle of 10)
description: Steel-tipped arrows with serrated edges, effective against unarmored targets.

name: Hawkfeather Arrow
description: A fletched arrow using hawk feathers for greater precision at range.

name: Crossbow Bolts (Set of 20)
description: Standard wooden bolts with iron tips, compatible with most hand crossbows.

name: Bowstring Wax Kit
description: A small tin of wax used to maintain and weatherproof bowstrings.

name: Runed Hunting Bow
description: Etched with ancient glyphs, this bow is favored by forest rangers for its durability and uncanny accuracy.

name: Silver-Tipped Arrow
description: Used against creatures vulnerable to silver, these arrows are both beautiful and deadly.

name: Composite Longbow
description: A powerful bow made of layered horn and wood, effective for mounted archers.

name: Silent Arrow
description: Fletched with feathers that dull sound in flight, ideal for stealth operations.

name: Bow Repair Kit
description: Includes spare strings, resin, and a small clamp for field maintenance.

name: Hardened Cedar Bow
description: A well-crafted bow made from seasoned cedar wood, offering balanced flexibility and strength.

name: Longbow of Whispering Winds
description: An elegant longbow with subtle carvings that seem to shift in the light, reputed to aid the wielder’s aim.

name: Reinforced Ash Crossbow
description: A sturdy crossbow reinforced with iron bands, known for its reliability in harsh conditions.

name: Silent String Bow
description: A bow strung with a rare silencing material, reducing noise when fired.

name: Featherlight Arrows
description: Arrows crafted from lightweight materials, allowing for longer flight and improved accuracy.

name: Dragonbone Arrowheads
description: Arrowheads forged from the bones of dragons, known for their exceptional durability and piercing power.

name: Elven Bowstring
description: A supple bowstring made from elven craftsmanship, enhancing the bow’s responsiveness.

name: Heavy War Crossbow
description: A large crossbow designed for siege warfare, capable of firing heavy bolts.

name: Enchanted Quiver
description: A quiver that magically preserves and replenishes a limited number of arrows.

name: Bolts of Piercing
description: Crossbow bolts designed to penetrate the toughest armor with ease.

name: Tanned Leather Hide
description: A large, supple hide of tanned leather, suitable for crafting armor or gear.

name: Leatherworking Tools Set
description: A complete set of tools for cutting, shaping, and stitching leather.

name: Studded Leather Armor
description: Light leather armor reinforced with metal studs, offering balanced protection and mobility.

name: Reinforced Leather Gloves
description: Durable gloves made from layered leather, reinforced at the knuckles.

name: Elvensoft Leather Boots
description: Lightweight boots made from finely tanned leather, known for comfort and durability.

name: Leatherworking Dye Set
description: Vials of natural dyes in various colors used to tint leather goods.

name: Enchanted Leather Strap
description: A finely crafted leather strap imbued with subtle magic to increase its resilience.

name: Pack Saddle
description: A sturdy leather saddle designed to distribute weight evenly on pack animals.

name: Leather-bound Journal Cover
description: A handcrafted leather cover designed to protect journals or spellbooks.

name: Ranger's Quiver Holster
description: A rugged leather holster for securing a quiver, designed for ease of access.

name: Mystic Leather Bracers
description: Leather bracers inscribed with faint magical runes, rumored to offer protection.

name: Exquisite Leather Satchel
description: A finely crafted satchel with intricate stitching and enchanted to be more durable.

name: Cured Dragonhide
description: A rare, tough hide treated with ancient methods, prized for durability and flexibility.

name: Leatherworking Stitching Kit
description: A set of fine needles and waxed thread used for delicate and precise leatherwork.

name: Traveler’s Leather Cloak
description: A heavy cloak made from thick leather, offering protection against weather and wear.

name: Soft Buckskin Gloves
description: Lightweight gloves made from soft buckskin, comfortable for long wear.

name: Runed Leather Belt
description: A belt adorned with faintly glowing runes, said to subtly enhance the wearer’s endurance.

name: Hunter’s Leather Quiver
description: A rugged quiver designed to hold arrows securely, crafted from tough leather.

name: Leatherworking Conditioner
description: A specially formulated balm to soften and preserve leather goods.

name: Chameleon Leather Boots
description: Boots crafted from supple leather that subtly change hue to blend with surroundings.

name: Leatherworking Apron
description: A durable apron with pockets for tools and materials, essential for any craftsman.

name: Leather Luggage Satchel
description: A sturdy satchel designed for travelers, made with reinforced seams and durable leather.

name: Armored Leather Bracers
description: Bracers reinforced with additional leather padding, favored by scouts and rangers.

name: Enchanted Leather Mask
description: A finely tooled mask imbued with magic, rumored to aid in concealment.

name: Iron Longsword
description: A balanced longsword forged from iron, suitable for most adventurers.

name: Steel Battleaxe
description: A heavy battleaxe crafted for delivering powerful blows.

name: Warhammer
description: A hammer with a reinforced head designed for crushing armor.

name: Serrated Dagger
description: A sharp dagger with serrated edges, excellent for close combat.

name: Poisoned Throwing Knives (set of 3)
description: A trio of knives coated with a mild paralytic poison.

name: Ornate Silver Dagger
description: A finely crafted dagger with silver inlays, favored for ceremonial use.

name: Heavy War Spear
description: A spear reinforced with iron bands, designed to pierce through armor.

name: Halberd
description: A versatile polearm combining axe blade and spear point.

name: Enchanted Glaive
description: A sleek glaive humming softly with arcane power.

name: Blade Maintenance Kit
description: A kit containing oils, whetstones, and cloths for weapon upkeep.

name: Mastercraft Sharpening Stone
description: A finely ground stone that restores even the dullest edges.

name: Custom Engraved Sword
description: A personalized blade featuring detailed engravings along its fuller.

name: Runed Longsword
description: A longsword inscribed with faint runes that shimmer with latent power.

name: Elven-made Short Sword
description: A finely balanced short sword crafted by elven smiths, light and deadly.

name: Steel Greatsword
description: A heavy two-handed sword designed for powerful strikes.

name: Poisoned Dirk
description: A dagger dipped in a slow-acting venom, favored by assassins.

name: Silvered Throwing Axe
description: A small axe coated with a silver finish to bypass certain defenses.

name: Knight’s Lance
description: A long lance designed for mounted combat and jousting tournaments.

name: Flame-Touched Halberd
description: A halberd imbued with subtle warmth, occasionally sparking with flame.

name: Precision Sharpening Kit
description: A set of tools crafted for meticulous sharpening and weapon upkeep.

name: Master’s Custom Crossbow
description: A finely crafted crossbow tailored to the buyer’s specifications.

name: Mythic Edge Longsword
description: A legendary sword said to have been forged by ancient gods, pulsating faintly with power.

name: Shadowfang Dagger
description: A dagger that seems to absorb light around its edge, rumored to strike from the shadows.

name: Stormcaller Spear
description: A spear that hums softly during thunderstorms, said to command the skies.

name: Ethereal Blade Maintenance Kit
description: A kit imbued with magic that preserves weapons beyond the natural wear of time.

name: Dragonbone Warhammer
description: A warhammer fashioned from the bone of a great dragon, radiating latent energy.

name: Ceremonial Blade
description: A sword decorated with intricate patterns, used in important rituals.

name: Leather-Wrapped Throwing Axe
description: A balanced axe wrapped in leather for better grip and handling.

name: Runed Pike
description: A long pike etched with ancient runes that glow faintly in darkness.

name: Custom Engraved Shield Spike
description: A sharp spike designed to be affixed to shields, engraved with fine patterns.

name: Iron Mace
description: A simple iron mace with a heavy head designed to deliver crushing blows.

name: Spiked Morning Star
description: A sturdy wooden shaft topped with a spiked metal ball for extra damage.

name: Heavy Warhammer
description: A warhammer with a broad, flat head designed to smash through armor.

name: Flail
description: A weapon with a spiked ball attached to a chain for swinging strikes.

name: Silvered Mace
description: A mace coated with silver, effective against certain foes.

name: Blessed Warhammer
description: A warhammer blessed by clerics, said to strike with divine favor.

name: Mace of Resonance
description: This mace hums faintly and vibrates with a subtle power when swung.

name: Morning Star of the Ancients
description: An ancient morning star said to hold the strength of forgotten heroes.

name: Chain Flail of Binding
description: A magical flail rumored to restrain the target upon impact.

name: Reinforced Wooden Mace
description: A heavy wooden mace strengthened with metal bands for durability.

name: Obsidian-Studded Club
description: A brutal club studded with sharp obsidian shards to increase damage.

name: Hammer of Earthshaking
description: A heavy warhammer said to cause tremors with every strike.

name: Warped Iron Nails
description: A small pouch of misshapen iron nails. Still functional with some effort.

name: Rust-Spotted Horseshoe
description: An iron horseshoe with signs of rust. Might last a few more rides.

name: Dented Bronze Helm
description: An outdated helm with a visible dent and worn padding.

name: Cracked Wooden Shield
description: A battered shield with a crack running through its center.

name: Splintery Wooden Chair
description: A hastily assembled chair, prone to creaking and splinters.

name: Rough-Cut Shelf Board
description: A plank intended for shelving, but unevenly sawed and poorly sanded.

name: Crooked Arrows (bundle of 5)
description: A bundle of arrows with warped shafts. Still usable at short range.

name: Frayed Bowstring
description: A worn bowstring with visible fraying. May snap under strain.

name: Cured Hide (Stained)
description: A strip of leather cured in haste, bearing discoloration.

name: Cracked Leather Pouch
description: A small pouch made from brittle leather. The stitching is uneven.

name: Unbalanced Short Sword
description: A short sword with uneven weight distribution, making it hard to wield.

name: Blunt Spearhead
description: A spear with a dull point, more of a stick than a weapon.
